amendment.description: Amendment to redirect $5 million within the general operating expenses of the Veterans Benefits Administration to support programs that help veterans transition to the workforce.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase funding for the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration account by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Walberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
